races.name: Human
races.description: Versatile and ambitious beings with diverse abilities.
racialSkills: Versatile Heritage: Gain proficiency in one skill of your choice.
features: Extra Language: Learn one additional language of your choice.
Adaptable: Gain an additional feat at 1st level.

races.name: Elf
races.description: Graceful and long-lived, with a deep connection to nature.
racialSkills: Darkvision: Accustomed to twilit forests and the night sky.
Keen Senses: Proficiency in Perception skill.
features: Trance: Meditate deeply for 4 hours instead of sleeping.
Fey Ancestry: Advantage on saving throws against being charmed.

races.name: Dwarf
races.description: Sturdy and skilled craftsmen, known for their resilience.
racialSkills: Darkvision: Accustomed to life underground.
Dwarven Resilience: Advantage on saving throws against poison.
Dwarven Combat Training: Proficiency with battle axes, hand axes, throwing hammers, and warhammers.
features: Stonecunning: Add double proficiency bonus to History checks related to stonework.
Dwarven Toughness: Gain extra hit points for each level.

races.name: Halfling
races.description: Small and nimble folk, adept at avoiding danger.
racialSkills: Lucky: When you roll a 1 on an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, you can reroll the die.
Brave: Advantage on saving throws against being frightened.
features: Halfling Nimbleness: Move through the space of any creature that is of a size larger than yours.
Naturally Stealthy: Can attempt to hide even when obscured only by a creature that is at least one size larger.

races.name: Dragonborn
races.description: Proud and honorable beings with draconic ancestry.
racialSkills: Draconic Ancestry: Breath weapon and resistance based on ancestry.
features: Breath Weapon: Exhale destructive energy as a breath weapon.
Draconic Resistance: Gain resistance to the damage type associated with your draconic ancestry.

races.name: Tiefling
races.description: Infernal-blooded creatures with a mysterious and alluring aura.
racialSkills: Darkvision: Accustomed to the dark.
Hellish Resistance: Resistance to fire damage.
features: Infernal Legacy: Know the Thaumaturgy cantrip. At higher levels, gain additional spells.
Hellish Rebuke: React with hellish flames when damaged by a creature within 60 feet.

races.name: Gnome
races.description: Inventive and curious individuals, often with a love for illusions.
racialSkills: Darkvision: Accustomed to the subterranean realms.
Gnome Cunning: Advantage on all Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.
features: Gnome Cunning: Advantage on all Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.
Artificer's Lore: Double proficiency bonus on History checks related to magic items, alchemical objects, or technological devices.

races.name: Half-elf
races.description: A mix of human and elf blood, blending the best of both worlds.
racialSkills: Darkvision: Accustomed to twilit forests and the night sky.
Fey Ancestry: Advantage against being charmed.
Skill Versatility: Gain proficiency in two skills of your choice.
features: Fey Ancestry: Advantage on saving throws against being charmed.
Versatile Heritage: Gain proficiency in two skills of your choice.

races.name: Half-orc
races.description: Powerful and fierce warriors with orc and human heritage.
racialSkills: Darkvision: Accustomed to life in the wild.
Menacing: Intimidation skill proficiency.
Relentless Endurance: When reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, drop to 1 hit point instead.
features: Relentless Endurance: When reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, drop to 1 hit point instead.
Savage Attacks: Roll an additional damage die when scoring a critical hit.

races.name: Aasimar
races.description: Celestial-touched beings with a divine connection.
racialSkills: Darkvision: Accustomed to seeing in the dark.
Celestial Resistance: Resistance to necrotic and radiant damage.
features: Celestial Legacy: Know the Light cantrip. At higher levels, gain additional spells.
Healing Hands: Touch a creature to heal it with celestial energy.

classes.name: Barbarian
classes.description: Fierce warriors who rely on instinct and raw power.
specialAbilities: Rage: Bonus to damage and resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.
features: Unarmored Defense: AC calculation using Dexterity and Constitution.
Reckless Attack: Gain advantage on melee attacks but suffer advantage on attacks against you.

classes.name: Bard
classes.description: Charismatic performers who use magic and music.
specialAbilities: Bardic Inspiration: Bonus to an ally's ability check, attack roll, or saving throw.
features: Spellcasting: Cast spells drawn from the bard spell list.
Jack of All Trades: Add half proficiency to any ability check you make that doesn't already include your proficiency bonus.

classes.name: Cleric
classes.description: Divine spellcasters devoted to a deity or higher power.
specialAbilities: Divine Domain: Unique set of spells and abilities based on chosen domain.
features: Spellcasting: Cast divine spells.
Channel Divinity: Use divine energy for special effects related to your domain.

classes.name: Druid
classes.description: Mystic nature-wielders with the ability to shape-shift.
features: Druidic: Speak the secret language of druids.
Natural Recovery: Regain spell slots during a short rest.

classes.name: Fighter
classes.description: Skilled warriors with a mastery of combat techniques.
specialAbilities: Fighting Style: Choose a specific combat style for bonuses.
features: Second Wind: Heal yourself in the midst of battle.
Action Surge: Take an additional action on your turn.

classes.name: Monk
specialAbilities: Unarmored Defense: AC calculation using Dexterity and Wisdom.
features: Martial Arts: Use Dexterity for attack and damage rolls with unarmed strikes and monk weapons.
Ki: Harness inner energy for various effects.

classes.name: Paladin
classes.description: Holy knights sworn to uphold justice and righteousness.
specialAbilities: Divine Sense: Detect the presence of celestial, fiendish, or undead beings.
features: Lay on Hands: Heal wounds by touch.
Divine Smite: Expends spell slots to deal extra damage on attacks.

classes.name: Ranger
classes.description: Expert trackers and archers who excel in the wilderness.
specialAbilities: Favored Enemy: Gain bonuses when tracking specific creature types.
features: Natural Explorer: Navigate through various terrains with ease.
Primeval Awareness: Detect creatures in your favored terrain.

classes.name: Rogue
classes.description: Sneaky and cunning individuals skilled in stealth and subterfuge.
specialAbilities: Sneak Attack: Extra damage when you have advantage on an attack.
features: Thieves' Cant: Speak a secret language of thieves.
Evasion: Take half damage from certain area effects.

classes.name: Wizard
classes.description: Scholars and spellcasters who harness the power of arcane magic.
specialAbilities: Arcane Recovery: Recover expended spell slots during a short rest.
features: Spellbook: Record and prepare spells from your spellbook.
Arcane Tradition: Choose a school of magic for additional benefits.
